fields.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?>
<PageXML xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" 
xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation="http://buscaplus-test.s3.amazonaws.com/schemas/1.4.3/email.xsd">
	<Version>1.4.2</Version>
	<EmailContainer id="DICT_EMAIL">
		<Subject>[Ximpia] Email Validation</Subject>
		<Message>
		$name,
		
		Thanks for signing up in Ximpia.
		
		We need to confirm your email address. Just click on the link:		
		http://$host/activateUser/$user/$activationCode
		
		Regards
		--
		Ximpia Team
		webmaster@ximpia.com
		</Message>
	</EmailContainer>
</PageXML>
fields.name: Msg/SocialNetwork/Signup/Professional/

fields.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?>
<PageXML xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" 
xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation="http://buscaplus-test.s3.amazonaws.com/schemas/1.4.3/email.xsd">
	<Version>1.4.2</Version>
	<EmailContainer id="DICT_EMAIL">
		<Subject>[Ximpia] Email Validation</Subject>
		<Message>
		$name,
		
		Thanks for signing up in Ximpia.
		
		Your account has been created:
		$account
		
		We need to confirm your email address. Just click on the link:		
		http://$host/activateUser/$user/$activationCode
		
		Regards
		--
		Ximpia Team
		webmaster@ximpia.com
		</Message>
	</EmailContainer>
</PageXML>
fields.name: Msg/SocialNetwork/Signup/Organization/

fields.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?>
<PageXML xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" 
xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation="http://buscaplus-test.s3.amazonaws.com/schemas/1.4.3/email.xsd">
	<Version>1.4.2</Version>
	<EmailContainer id="DICT_EMAIL">
		<Subject>[Ximpia] Account Verification</Subject>
		<Message>
		Administrator,
		
		An organization account has been created.
		
		Account: $account
		Organization: $organizationName
		Group: $organizationGroup
		LinkedIn: linkedin
		Name: $name		
		
		Regards
		--
		Ximpia Team
		webmaster@ximpia.com
		</Message>
	</EmailContainer>
</PageXML>
fields.name: Msg/SocialNetwork/Signup/AdminNotify/
